t: Amazon FBM (Fulfilled by Merchant) | Sell on Amazon

t: Are there cases of engineering managers or above being put on PIP (performance improvement plan) at big companies like Google, FB, Amazon, Microsoft etc.? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 2): Absolutely. I personally know of two managers who have either been put on a performance improvement plan or received a “not meeting expectations” rating. Only high level managers would ever hear of this, except through leaks, which is how I know about both of these.
